name: Don't Crash (itch) (Arctos_FI)
description:
You have only one goal: Not to hit anything! Avoid obstacles and other cars to survive as long as you can.

Gameplay:

  • Target is to avoid crashing and survive
  • You can unlock second car when getting record over 10 minutes

Controls:

  • A and D turns the car(Arrow keys also work)

This is school project

Know bugs:

  • Game over- screen doesn't always show score (but high score is always calculated)
  • When starting the game the car doesn't show up until you select other car or start level and get back to menu
  • Game doesn't save your progress
